title: Governance Models
prompt: A weathered wooden table in a small-town community center, photographed from above in soft morning light filtering through large windows, with hands of multiple people (obscured identities) arranged around papers, maps, and notebooksâ€”suggesting collaborative decision-making and shared responsibility. The composition captures worn surfaces, coffee cups, and natural textures of rural institutional spaces, conveying quiet authority and the weight of local governance without sentimentality. Documentary photojournalism style, muted earth tones, emphasizing the texture of authentic community deliberation rather than polished corporate meetings.
